your rite… i didnt but it was a cleaned source that had nothin added… :l

And if you want anything decent, thats what you’re going to have to do. The other alternative is use RS2D.

item.title: Anti lagg
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

It is lagging because you multithread each connection, and never actually properly clean up, and keep everything on the heap. This causes load on the JVM, and produces lag.

As _Vengeance said, build a new server with efficiency and stability in mind.

[quote=“bonza, post:7, topic:226285”]zomg lol…
mines a server base it comes with anti-lagg class file cant i just edit the java file or sumfin :’( took me ages an sleepless nites to work on dis…

  • soz about spellling *[/quote]
    It takes you a night to read, copy and paste a few lines of code? I can see why your server is terribly inefficient.

Read full topic

item.description:
@_Vengeance wrote:

Your server, like every other server here, is built terribly, with no consideration for efficiency. Solution: Build a new server from the ground up with efficiency and stability in mind.
